_meta.name: Europe region assignment
_meta.long-description: If you're not assigned to the Europe region, this will assign you to it. If you're already assigned to the Europe region, this will remove your assignment.

region-eu.response-assigned: You've been assigned to EU. If you change your mind, you can run the same command again to remove yourself from EU.
region-eu.response-removed: You've been removed from EU. If you change your mind, you can run the same command again to assign yourself to EU.
region-eu.response-changes-applied: The changes to your EU assignment have been applied.

_meta.name: North America region assignment
_meta.short-description: Toggles the North America region assignment
_meta.long-description: If you're not assigned to the North America region, this will assign you to it. If you're already assigned to the North America region, this will remove your assignment.

region-na.response-assigned: You've been assigned to NA. If you change your mind, you can run the same command again to remove yourself from NA.
region-na.response-removed: You've been removed from NA. If you change your mind, you can run the same command again to assign yourself to NA.
region-na.response-changes-applied: The changes to your NA assignment have been applied.

_meta.name: Wiki search
_meta.short-description: Searches the Guild Wars 2 Wiki for an article
_meta.long-description: Searches the Guild Wars 2 Wiki for an article and returns a summary and the article link if found.

wiki.response-not-found: Your request did not come up with any results. Try using different search terms.
wiki.response-no-title: Please provide a wiki article title or search terms.

chat-code.response-message: {{user}} has included Guild Wars 2 chat codes in their message:

experienced.response-passed-experienced-check: {{user}}, you've passed the experienced check. Congratulations!
